description.value: Diaries kept by Allison recording his daily activities as a historian at Bryn Mawr College, Colgate University, Pacific Theological Seminary, and other institutions; clergyman at Penacook Baptist Church, Concord, N.H.; and consultant to the Library of Congress in church history.  Includes a diary (1868-1869) kept by his grandmother, Mary Ireland Allison.

notes.value:
Open to research.

Gift, Emily Mills Allison, 1941.

Historian and clergyman.

Collection material in English.

Finding aid available in the Library of Congress Manuscript Reading Room and at http://hdl.loc.gov/loc.mss/eadmss.ms009104
